content.question: For his installation En la Barberia no se Llora (No Crying Allowed in the Barbershop), Pepon Osorio combined a barbershop with various types of imagery primarily in order to

choices.label: make the audience aware of the consequences of colonialism
promote pride in the audience about their cultural heritage
engage the audience in a reflection about cultural gender norms
confront the audience with the legacy of dictatorships

content.answer: engage the audience in a reflection about cultural gender norms

topic.text: 10.2: Purpose and Audience in Global Contemporary Art

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, function, and/or context of a work of art (or group of related works of art) elicit a response or shape its reception.
